creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: red with white beads; small drawstring bag completely covered with embroidery, both sides; white beaded fringe on three sides; braided drawstring, knotted with beads at end; diamond design on one side, zig-zag on other; lined
dimension:
5 1/2 x 4 3/4 in. (13.97 x 12.07 cm) (without fringe)
1/2 in. (1.27 cm) (fringe, narrowest)
2 1/4 in. (5.72 cm) (fringe, widest)
title: Bag
